audio_sermons.title: The Wonderful Works of God
audio_sermons.description: Scripture used: Psalms 111 + 19; preached on Sun A.M. July 27/69. A message delivered a week after the Apollo 11 moon landing Pastor Fitch reflects on how God should receive all the glory for mans 'achievments'. He paints an awe-inspring picture of the greatness of our God, and how God's wonderful works can only lead us to praise Him. He shows how the great works of the Lord are sought out by those who have pleasure in them.
